translations: n.盎司（重量单位，1盎司约等于28克）；一点点，少量；雪豹

sentences.sentence: This little ball of gold weighs a quarter of an ounce.
In early trading in Hong Kong yesterday, gold was quoted at $368.20 an ounce.
sentences.translation: 昨天在香港早市的交易中，黄金被报出每盎司$368.20的牌价。

sentences.sentence: Michelle will also spin a customer's wool fleece to specification at a cost of $2.25 an ounce.
sentences.translation: 米歇尔也将以每盎司$2.25的价格按照顾客的要求为其纺羊毛呢。
